<<<<<<< HEAD
Antichrist in flesh unmask'd, the Quakers Christianity vindicated, from the malicious and injurious attempts of [brace] Edward Paye, William Alcott, & Henry Loader, in their late defaming confused book falsly styled, Antichrist in spirit unmask'd, or Quakerism a great delusion, wherein their causeless outrage, folly and falshood are deservedly exposed. Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.
[2], 5-32 p.
Printed for Thomas Northcott ..., London, : 1692.
Signed on p. 26: George Whitehead. Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
=======

Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.
[2], 5-32 p.
Printed for Thomas Northcott ..., London, : 1692.
Signed on p. 26: George Whitehead. Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
